### LexBracket() {#a0bd717a0a2494e328bda48a072285f4f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="tgtok::TokKind TGLexer::LexBracket ()">
LexBracket - We just read &#39;&#91;&#39;.

If this is a code block, return it, otherwise return the bracket. Match: &#39;&#91;&#39; and &#39;&#91;&#123; ( &#91;^&#125;&#93;+ | &#125;&#91;^&#93;&#93; )&#42; &#125;&#93;&#39;

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tglexer-h/#l00259">259</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tglexer-h">TGLexer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tglexer-cpp/#l00561">561</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tglexer-cpp">TGLexer.cpp</a>.

### LexInclude() {#ab5ef617d481fb90b346f98d37985c4af}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool TGLexer::LexInclude ()">
LexInclude - We just read the &quot;include&quot; token.

Get the string token that comes next and enter the include.
